price: 1. Les mécréants, parmi les gens du Livre et les associâtres, n’allaient pas renoncer (à leur impiété) avant que ne leur parvînt la preuve évidente :
arabic: لَمۡ يَكُنِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ مُنفَكِّينَ حَتَّىٰ تَأۡتِيَهُمُ ٱلۡبَيِّنَةُ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: lam yakuni alladhīna kafarū min ahli al-kitābi wal-mush'rikīna munfakkīna ḥattā tatiyahumu al-bayinatu
